column2: Model garments and other apparel to display clothing on ecommerce websites , social media platforms. May pose for photos to be used for advertising purposes. Physical fitness and endurance is a must. Work with our team to create content for YouTube. Required Candidate profile Must be Camera Savvy, Should be fit and extremely presentable, Interested candidates must share their portfolios along with resumes on mcube.arun@gmail.com or call 9873197045, Freshers can apply too..
